mapper.insert:
SELECT seguence.NEXTVAL AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into T_EXPERIENCE ( C_ID, C_COMPANY, C_COMPANY_STIME, C_COMPANY_ETIME, C_POSITION, C_POSITION_DESCRIPTION, C_PROJECT, C_PROJECT_STIME, C_PROJECT_ETIME, C_DUTY_DESCRIPTION, C_RESUME_ID ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyStime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{companyEtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{position,jdbcType=DATE}, #{positionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectStime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{projectEtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dutyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resume.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
